segments.pli: “Tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, taking three reasons into consideration provides quite enough motivation to teach Dhamma to another.

segments.pli: Yo dhammaṃ deseti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
segments.en: When the teacher understands the meaning and the teaching.

segments.pli: Yo dhammaṃ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
segments.en: When the audience understands the meaning and the teaching.

segments.pli: Yo ceva dhammaṃ deseti yo ca dhammaṃ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṃvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṃvedino ca.
segments.en: When both the teacher and the audience understand the meaning and the teaching.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetun”ti.
segments.en: Taking these three reasons into consideration provides quite enough motivation to teach Dhamma to another.”
